page.title: 12THE POST OFFICE
page.content: { Hulland Ward Post Office}was built in {1956.}The people who work there have done so for{27 years.}However,no-one worked there before them as they built it.The{Post Office}has about{five {hundred customers}a{month.}The most commonly sold{stamp}is the{thirteen {pence stamp.}A variety of other products can also be purchased-{cards, {seeds,postal orders,pens,paper, {pencils,wrapping paper etc.}The{Post {Office}now covers an area of around {one quarter of an acre.}Stock is supplied by the{Head Post Office.
